frontmatter.title: Paper Circuitry
frontmatter.abstract: The paper circuitry is part of Embelashed - a toolkit for prototyping embodied audio interfaces with Bela

markdownRemark.html: The embelashed project is led by Dr Becky Stewart in collaboration with Augmented Instruments Ltd, in which we designed paper circuitry, circuit templates and a series of tutorials on how to build sensors along with guides on how to make Paper Capelet and Pocket Connectors which allow users to connect those paper sensors to a Bela Mini
